Title: The Law of Inevitability
Writer: Noah Hawley, Matt Wolpert, Ben Nedivi, Noah Hawley (created for television by)
Actors: Ewan McGregor, Carrie Coon, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Goran Bogdan
Plot: Gloria tries to work around the system; Nikki finds herself in a familiar place; Varga comes up with an alternative plan; Emmit goes to dinner.
